Chesnaught (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0651: Quilladin
Pokémon
#0653: Fennekin →

Chesnaught has been featured on 6 different cards since it debuted in the Kalos Starter Set of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Chesnaught cards are normally Grass-type Stage 2 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Chesnaught

Chesnaught
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #
Chesnaught Kalos Starter Set   5/39 XY Beginning Set   005/039

        XY-P Promotional cards   071/XY-P
        Premium Champion Pack   014/131
Chesnaught BREAKthrough 11/162 Red Flash 005/059
XY Black Star Promos   XY68
